official_title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to acquire by condemnation a 25-acre shoreline parcel within the boundaries of Kaloko-Honokohau National Historical Park.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to acquire by condemnation certain land along the shoreline within the boundaries of Kaloko-Honokohau National Historical Park in Hawaii.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to acquire by condemnation a 25-acre shoreline parcel within the boundaries of Kaloko-Honokohau National Historical Park.
